name: VacosSmartLife
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your Vacos devices! Alexa can also show you the live feed from a camera on a supported device!*

1)Download the Vacos app from Apple App Store or Google Play Store (skip to step 4 if you have already set up your cameras).
2)Log in to your Vacos account or create a new one.
3)Click the Plus sign and follow the on-screen instructions to add your Vacos devices.
4)Download and open the Amazon Alexa app and log in to your Amazon account.
5)Tap the top left for the menu and select “Skills & Games”.
6)Search for “Vacos Smart Life”, click on it, and click Enable To Use.
7)Link your Vacos account with Vacos username and password.

And that’s it! Just speak to Alexa to control your Vacos devices! You do not need to invoke or prompt with a different word, just say “Alexa!”

*For all other cameras you can view live videos on your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV (all generations), Fire TV Stick (2nd generation), and Fire Tablets (7th generation and later).
